Room.Name: Leviathan Dock
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the Leviathan Dock, on the beach of the Nylandian Bay.
Room.LongDescription: The Leviathan Dock runs west into the bay, providing access to the various ships and vessels docked inside the breakwater of the Nylandian Bay. Most of the bay is empty right now, but a few merchant ships are nearby. The near part of the dock is where the pirate ship Widow Maker berthes when she is in port. Marina Way is located to the east, and the dock continues to the west.
